name: api-mail
description: Serverless aws lambda endpoint to deliver mails from contact forms
author: jroehl <mail@johannroehl.de>

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run jest
scripts.start:offline: npm run parse:environment && serverless offline --port 6060 start
scripts.start:offline:prod: npm run parse:environment && serverless offline --port 6060 -s production start
scripts.deploy: npm run parse:environment && serverless deploy -s dev
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run parse:environment && serverless deploy -s production
